page.title: 13Gargrave, Housing.
page.content:
For many years the{Sewage Farm}was inadequate, and there was no new building. It has now been brought up to date, and some new building is going ahead. { {High Mill, Goffa Mill,}the{Old School} and some old{barns}have been{converted to very attractive dwellings. A builder who bought up most of the spare land within the village has not made use of it yet.
There is no{slum property}in the village. All the old cottages have been brought up to date, and property here tends to be more{expensive}than in nearby Skipton.
